about_the_game:
Our art books are more than all the gorgeous art in the game! We give a running commentary throughout the book explaining the journey we went on to make this game. This is one of the reasons our art books are so incredibly popular!

This Full Color art book includes:
  • Sprites
  • Insight into Each Character's Purpose
  • Early Pencil Sketches of Art, Along with the Final Versions
  • All the CGs
  • All the Backgrounds
  • Two or More CGs on Every Page
  • The Art Creation and Collaboration Process
  • The Story Creation Process

Once you purchase and install/download the Art Book in the DLC list of Gods of Love in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Gods of Love) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the art book in this folder.
